name: Who Played Who in "Dead Poet's Society"? Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Robin Williams & Williams.

	Robin Williams began his career on TV as Mork on "Happy Days" which was spun off into his own show "Mork and Mindy". His movie debut was playing the title character in "Popeye".  For his role in "Good Will Hunting" he won his first Academy Award.

Robert Sean Leonard.

	Other movies that have starred Robert Sean Leonard are: "Much Ado About Nothing", "Swing Kids", and "The Age of Innocence".  He won a 2001 Tony Award for his portrayal of A.E. Houseman in Tom Stoppard's "The Invention of Love".

Josh Charles.

	He made his debut in the movie "Hairspray" in 1988 a year before "Dead Poet's Society".  He also starred in the TV series "Sports Night".

Ethan Hawke & Hawke.

	Ethan was married to actress Uma Thurman in 1998.  He made his movie debut in "Explorers" which co-starred River Phoenix.  He directed the Lisa Loeb music video "Stay". He received his first Oscar nomination for the 2001 movie "Training Day".

Kurtwood Smith.

	Kurtwood Smith is better known for his role as Red Forman on TV's "That 70's Show".

Gale Hansen.

	Charlie Dalton nicknamed himself Nuwanda in the movie.  Other movies to his credit are "Shaking the Tree" and "Under Surveillance".

Allelon Ruggiero.

	Co-starred with baseball pitcher John Rocker in the 2002 movie "The Greenskeeper".

Dylan Kussman.

	Other movies to his credit are "Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken" and "The Way Of The Gun".

James Waterston.

	James is the son of Sam Waterston, star of TV's "Law and Order".  Other movies to his credit are "Little Sweetheart" and "A Dog Race In Alaska".

Alexandra Powers.

	Alexandra played Kati Rocky (1990-1992) on TV's "21 Jump Street" and Jane Halliday (1993-1994) on TV's "LA Law".  Other movies to her credit are "The Player", "Out to Sea", and "Rising Sun".
